actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution providing that the United States shall not participate in any civil action except as a party to such civil action.

summary.text: Provides that the United States shall not participate as amicus curiae or in any other fashion in any civil action in any Court of the United States except as a party to such civil action.

titles.title: Joint resolution providing that the United States shall not participate in any civil action except as a party to such civil action.
